results.name: Take sum of squares of digits of previous term; start with 9.
reference: R. Honsberger, Ingenuity in Mathematics, Random House, 1970, p. 83.
link: Arthur Porges, A set of eight numbers, Amer. Math. Monthly 52 (1945), 379-382.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1).
formula: a(n) = A080709(n-2) for n > 4. - _M. F. Hasler_, May 24 2009
program: /* This code has been checked as follows: */
